data.name: Fantasy Fishing梦幻捕鱼
data.detailed_description:
Game features

[random events bring good luck]
The unique boss calling event allows you to experience what good luck is! Fun, good-looking and exciting!

[Daily reward]
Daily bonus and claim a large amount of gold, daily tasks, festival playing methods.

[the deep-sea monster fighting]
A mermaid of all kinds, a biochemical whale, a mysterious and powerful ice dragon, a volcano knight, special boss scene interaction and event playing methods, a perfect immersive experience, you are the sea king! More mysterious bosses are waiting for you to explore!

[super weapon ]
The truly innovative experience, the energy ball , the air strike, the rampant missile, etc., will definitely make you feel great!

[powerful turret]
The exclusive custom-made turret skin makes you amazing in the fishing world.

[classic arcade ]
Classic arcade play fishing game, easy to big win!

data.short_description: This is a free casual game to capture all kinds of fantastic sea fish and deep sea monsters to win the treasure of pirates . No complicated game skills , just click on the fish to shoot .
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64Bits
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 | AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
